title: [Krag Slopes, Freshwater Cavern]
description: An astonishing amount of both light and fresh air enters this cavern through the fissure leading back outside.  Water, which appears to be fresh, is cascading into a shallow pool from the ceiling high above and the area is pleasantly clean.
